title: Mourner cloak

properties.name: description
properties.value: The mourner cloak is part of the mourner set. To obtain them, players must kill a level 11 Mourner on the path to Prifddinas. However, the Mourner will bring all combat stats down to 20, so it is recommended players bring a stat restore potion before fighting. They give no bonuses.

Mourner cloak

Advanced data
Item ID6070

The mourner cloak is part of the mourner set. To obtain them, players must kill a level 11 Mourner on the path to Prifddinas. However, the Mourner will bring all combat stats down to 20, so it is recommended players bring a stat restore potion before fighting. They give no bonuses.

If you lose this cape, you can get another one by killing a level 11 Mourner again.

[[File:Mourner cloak detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''mourner cloak''' is part of the [[mourner gear|mourner set]]. To obtain them, players must kill a level 11 [[Mourner]] on the path to [[Prifddinas]]. However, the Mourner will bring all combat stats down to 20, so it is recommended players bring a [[stat restore potion]] before fighting. They give no bonuses.

If you lose this cape, you can get another one by killing a level 11 [[Mourner]] again.
